items.text: short of length but down the leg side, goes for the pull, misses but collects a leg-bye to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, 1 leg bye

items.text: back of length outside off, punches it off the back foot but straight to extra cover, he's not happy with himself there
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller outside off this time, comes forward and drives it past the extra cover fielder, beats the man in the deep as well, crisp drive that one with class written all over it, a good front foot stride, high elbow and great balance
items.postText: SarfBD: "Imrul is not technically very sound. He will inevitably edge few at thehe start of the innings. He moves his feet better than Soumya, but then will simply let his bat hang away from the body to edge. How many big innings he played without a life? Having said that, I value him because with all his limitations, he tries to put a price on his wicket unlike his swashbuckling competitors. "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: length, just outside off, defended on the front foot, along the pad
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: length on middle and leg, turns it towards square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, uses his wrists to whip it past the short midwicket on his right
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller on middle and leg, was tossed up a bit, Bravo looks to break the shackles. Tries to go big down the ground, misses and the ball clatters into the leg stump
items.postText: Lewis: "About Darren Bravo: I think he must be given a long run. He still seems rusty to me. I still remember he scored 120 odd at run a ball against BD, he's got the ability. Just need to convert these starts now. "
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, OUT

dismissal.text: DM Bravo  b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 10 (26b 1x4 0x6) SR: 38.46

items.preText:
Marlon Samuels walks in

Shahid : "Two things i will never understand. 1st why Bravo plays like this always consume so many deliveries and then get out. 2nd why my comment never got the attention of the concern man to publish it?"
items.text: floated on a length around off, Samuels was a bit early into the shot, trying to turn it on the leg side, the ball hit the outer half and rolls towards covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, no run

items.text: length, but on middle and leg this time, flicked towards short fine leg
items.postText: Dipu: """Lewis"" you helped us to take the wicket of Bravo.."
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, 1 run

items.preText: Raash: "@Sumanth, Soumya hasn't played half of the Imrul's ODI, still he has bettter average and strike rate, both of them have 4 MOM awards. Imrul has sound technique!! lol! Did u see how he get out to Thomas in the first ODI? Both of them have technical problem but Soumya has better shot making and match turning ability."
items.text: length around off, defended from the crease
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.preText: Mashur: "Am I the only Bangladeshi fan here who is unhappy with Bravo getting out such early? Bangladesh should have planned to let him stay 10-12 overs more to keep their run rate below 4 :p"
items.text: back of length, bowled from wide of the crease, defended back with a straight bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps this time, flicked towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: length on middle and leg, turns it towards square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: short of length, on the hips, tickled down towards fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, 1 leg bye

items.text: back of length around off stump, punched off the back foot towards long-on
items.postText: Manan: "@mashur don't be sad. Samuels is still there to do your job."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: vivek: "Being an ardent WI fan it pains to see players like Bravo & Samuels playing so many dot balls & WICB still persisting with them.. Bring in fresh blood.. We have seen players like hetmeyer & what they can do... They should groom them"
items.text: fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on for a walking single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: down the leg side, goes for a glance and misses, a big appeal for caught-behind but given not out. Bangladesh think of reviewing it but decide against it in the end. Replays show it brushed the pads on its way
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, no run

items.text: length outside off, spins back to beat the forward push and hits him on the back leg, another big appeal denied and this time Bangladesh are reviewing it. A big stride forward, struck in line in front of middle stump but it was spinning way too much, just clipping the top of the leg stump, umpire's call there
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, no run

items.text: too full this time, on the stumps, hits it towards long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside off, lunges forward and whips it past extra cover for a couple of runs
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 2 runs

items.preText: Nishant Gulati: "Samuels inability to rotate strike is bordering on pathetic! Wish for WI sake that they play players like Pooran, Powell etc and give them an extended run. Samuels is spent force now and he puts so much pressure on his team mates which can never be good!"
items.text: fuller on the pads, clipped away towards deep square leg for an easy single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, that one just went parallel to the ground, looked like an offcutter. Hope was looking to punch it straight but it does underneath
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: length outside off, looked like another offcutter, Hope took a step or two towards the ball and looked to flick it away, missed and is struck on the pads, a big appeal and denied again. Bangladesh review, impact in line around middle but was missing leg. Bangladesh lose their review
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 leg bye

items.text: length, on middle and leg tucks, it away towards square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, 1 run
